text: Ernesto Vieira de Mendonça (born 27 October 1901) was a sailor from Portugal, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands and in the O-Jolle event at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== == Sources == * Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 6 Metre Category:Olympic sailors of Portugal Category:1901 births Category:Portuguese male sailors (sport) Category:Year of death missing Category:Sailors at the 1936 Summer Olympics – O-Jolle
title: Ernesto Mendonça
